title: Lygia Pape Postcard Set of 10
description:
Postcards developed from Lygia Pape’s: Tecelar (Weaving). 1957; Tecelar (Weaving), 1958; Tecelar (Weaving), 1954; Tecelar (Weaving), 1956; Tecelar (Weaving), 1959; Tecelar (Weaving), 1953; Weaving (Tecelar) [27/63.01.02], 1952; Weaving (Tecelar) [27/48.04.01]; Weaving (Tecelar) [27/27.01.01], 1955; Weaving (Tecelar) [27/21.03.01], 1953.

A selection of ten images from the exhibit: Lygia Pape: Tecelares.

  • Dimensions: 4.25 x 6 in. 
  • Materials: Sustainable FSC certified mix paper and vegetable-based inks.
  • Set of 10 postcards.
